A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It was fine. Spoilers:







Kudos to John Williams for getting a paycheck without doing any new work. All the big themes were pretty much rehashings. The big scene with Rey in the throne room played themes from RotJ The Last Battle\, where Vader was conflicted. The Falcon flying through the caves was RotJ Into the Death Star. which was in turn a rehashing of the trench run from SW.

In the skimmers\, when Finn decided not to turn back\, he continued in a straight line\, and pushed the throttle all the way forward\, therefore someone who turned away then turned back toward him would need a much higher velocity to intercept him.

The one thing that really got me though was Luke was a real Jedi. He messed up\, then he went into seclusion instead of doting something about it--like Yoda did\, and like Obi-wan did.
